segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, but hold onâ€”the water is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How did that happen so fast; the faucet must have been left on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming right under her, and she's clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the boy on the stool, reaching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that thing is tipping; he's going to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is there too, hand outstretched for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is shocking; they're sneaking treats while disaster brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, totally contrasting this mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hazards in such a normal-looking place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races thinking about the boy slipping on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything could crash down in seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR
